item.title: Flytipping, 11th January
item.description:
Huge amount of Flytipping on the oavement - right outside McDonalds. Old bags, carpets, broken electronics etc. see attached photo.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Eltham High Street, Eltham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping outside Mcdonalds, 11th January
item.description:
Shopping trolleys, cases, carpets bikes have all been left outside on the kerb. It appears to have been a homeless 'shepherd's which has been left abandoned.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Well Hall Road, Eltham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Untaxed abandoned vehicle, 11th January
item.description:
This car’s road tax ran out in Aug 25. It is SORN but is being kept in an on road parking space. It has been there for weeks if not a month or so and has not moved. It is in the first parking spaces in Victoria Road, on the left hand side, after you come round the corner from Mosslea Rd.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Victoria Road, Southborough, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Drain cover outside No 21 requires attention, 11th January
item.description:
The drain has dropped to a unsafe level which in now get worse, which over time will cause damage to vehicles and the road surface requires some attention

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Beverley Road, Barnehurst, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Yet more fly tipping on Chai Walk, 11th January
item.description:
Bedframe and boards left in Chai Walk yet again. Agudas Israel Housing Association has done nothing to discourage its tenants from fly tipping. The bedframe has a label saying bulky waste but no reference and it's now been there for a week.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Mount Pleasant Lane, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dead fox. Double bagged as per Council instructions, 11th January
item.description:
We found a dead fox at the edge of our drive/pavement. We have double bagged it as instructed on your site and would be grateful if it could be collected. Thanks
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Sussex Road, Poverest, Greater London

item.title: Weekly fly tipping Amelia Street, 11th January
item.description:
Weekly dumping of household rubbish by the bins of Amelia street - doesn’t get cleared with the bin lorry visits. Currently dirty nappies over the street. Please investigate to stop this being a weekly occurrence as this is an ongoing issue despite bins being provided.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Amelia Street, Elephant and Castle, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
